entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 9 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight then light before morning. Low minus 13 except minus 9 along the coast. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
